page.title: 04Home Life
page.content: In my family I have a big sister Sharon who is fifteen and my mam and dad.My mam and dad run a public house called The George.My sister and always wash and dry the dishes. In my family there are 4 people, there is my mam dad brother and myself.We have got a hamster and a dog My brother and I argue mostly about the television. In my family there is my mam,dad,and two sisters called Karen and Joanne. My dad keeps racing pigeons and help him to feed them.One day my dad let me hold one of the baby pigeons.My sisters always tell me what to do because they are older than me. There are four of us in our family.My dad works at Tow Law at Blairs he fixes machines.We keep hens and we have a donkey.
